item.title: Report E-2024110315
item.description:
Report E-2024110315

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-18T12:24:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-11
  • City: YPSILANTI
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On November 11, 2024, one (1) 275-gallon tote of UN1170 had a leak and released approximately one (1) cup of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to clean the site. All impacted materials were collected in one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal and the 275-gallon tote was staged for future shipment.

item.title: Report E-2024110233
item.description:
Report E-2024110233

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-15T12:23:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-12
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XGR experienced a UN2014 Hydrogen Peroxide 30% release from a box containing a 32-ounce poly bottle. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 6-ounces of product released to the cardboard and plastic packaging only due to the container being crushed and damaging the lid. The damaged bottle was placed into a 55-gallon vented poly drum. The impacted carboard, plastic, pads, and PPE were placed into a second 55-gallon poly drum and submerged in water. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024110465
item.description:
Report X-2024110465

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-14T12:23:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-07
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNTIED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH WITH FROST FORMING ON THE OUTER BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FOUR POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING MEAT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
